title: Crusade logistics and the battle over the slave trade
itunes:title: Crusade logistics and the battle over the slave trade
itunes:subtitle: Oxford historian Christopher Tyerman talks to us about his new book How to Plan a Crusade. Meanwhile, we pay a visit to the University of Cambridge where Ryan Cronin introduces some remarkable documents relating to British slave ownership.  ...
description:
Oxford historian Christopher Tyerman talks to us about his new book How to Plan a Crusade. Meanwhile, we pay a visit to the University of Cambridge where Ryan Cronin introduces some remarkable documents relating to British slave ownership. 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
itunes:summary:
Oxford historian Christopher Tyerman talks to us about his new book How to Plan a Crusade. Meanwhile, we pay a visit to the University of Cambridge where Ryan Cronin introduces some remarkable documents relating to British slave ownership. 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
